title: Mt. Joyâ€™s Matt Quinn on Creating Work That Lasts
description:
Ryan talks to Mt. Joyâ€™s frontman Matt Quinn about the current state of the music industry, how to create work that lasts, our responsibility for each other, and more. 

Matt Quinn is the frontman and songwriter for hit Philly folk group Mt. Joy. They named themselves Mt. Joy as an ode to a mountain in Valley Forge National Park. Matt was actually only a couple of months into law school when the single â€œAstrovanâ€ began racking up hundreds of thousands of plays on Spotify.
